find findIndex<T: Equatable>(item: T, array: [T]) -> Int? {
	for (index, value) in array.enumerated() {
		if item == value {
			return index
		}
	}
	return nil
}

let aNumber = 5
let someArray = [3, 4, 5, 6, 7]
